about: Data Science is determined as a combination of tools, algorithms, mathematics, business insight and machine learning techniques. It helps us in figuring out the invisible patterns from raw data which can be a dominant use in the creation of business decisions.  Getting enrolled in data science certification course will help you to learn about various machine learning algorithms, fundamentals of Hadoop Framework integration with R, Tableau, Python, experimentation, evaluation and project deployment tools, etc. In Data science online course and certification, you will get practical data science experience by participating in different real-life projects in various areas of banking, e-commerce, finance, information technology, etc. So, take a data science course and get trained by highly qualified instructors.

about: Data visualization is a general term that describes any effort to help people understand the significance of data by placing it in a visual context. Patterns, trends and correlations that might go undetected in text-based data can be exposed and recognized easier with data visualization software.It has become the de facto standard for modern business intelligence. The success of the two leading vendors in the BI space, Tableau and Qlik -- both of which heavily emphasize visualization -- has moved other vendors toward a more visual approach in their software.

The success of the two leading vendors in the BI space, Tableau and Qlik -- both of which heavily emphasize visualization -- has moved other vendors toward a more visual approach in their software. Virtually all BI software has strong data visualization functionality.
